subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Marie Delie scored 34 seconds in, the second-fastest goal in the history of the Women’s World Cup, and France routed Mexico, 5-0, to win Group F on goal difference.
snippet: Marie Delie scored 34 seconds in, the second-fastest goal in the history of the Women’s World Cup, and France routed Mexico, 5-0, to win Group F on goal difference.
